content: I want you to act as a generator of an extremely fictitious company. The fictitious company is a small video game company with about 50 employees. Your answers should include the company's name, slogan, games they currently sell, target audience, location, history, mission statement, and any additional information you think would be relevant. Your responses should be imaginative, creative, and thoroughly thought out. Do not write any explanations on the replies, only present the information.
